Articles.Content:
Existem estrategias no KSP que eu não consigo pegar, pois elas estão com o sinal de *#ERROR, quando tento aceitar a estrategia ele apenas consome os recursos e não executa a ação.

Agradeço a ajuda desde já

[Translation]
There are strategies in KSP that I can't get, because they have the * # ERROR sign, when I try to accept the strategy it just consumes resources and doesn't do the action.

Thanks for your help in advance

Edited November 9, 2019 by James Kerman
Added translation

Welcome to the forum @mma4004.

I've added a translation to your question because all posts outside of the international section require an English translation. I'm sorry you are having this problem and would like to know if you are running any mods and what operating system are you using?

[Translation]
Bem-vindo ao fórum @mma4004. Adicionei uma tradução à sua pergunta, porque todas as postagens fora da seção internacional exigem uma tradução em inglês. Sinto muito, você está tendo esse problema e gostaria de saber se você está executando algum mods e qual sistema operacional está usando?

Tengo el gato en mis pantalones.

 

Strategies from the Administration building?

I, actually, forgot that building even existed.

I never go there unless I'm farming the KSC for science points at the beginning.

22 hours ago, Mahnarch said:

Strategies from the Administration building?

I, actually, forgot that building even existed.

I never go there unless I'm farming the KSC for science points at the beginning.

I go there when I start to get too much science points and less need for them.
